description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Stop an onslaught of angry Avatars by…typing? Logical enough!  Can you type the sentences you're given before the enemies cross your path? Featuring 8 enemy types and 2 modes of play, the action is sure to last. With over 1,500+ sentences to type and the ability to create your own, you're almost guaranteed to develop a fun case of carpal tunnel! *Chatpad or Keyboard required.
